name: Disassembler
description:
Disassembler is VR game about disassembling robot heads, players see how many heads they can disassemble within a time limit by pulling levers, pressing buttons and twisting screws attached to the heads. Basically a gamified showcase of some basic VR interactions I wanted to build out instead of just using other peoples code. Built over a weekend as little personal game jam.


build for and tested on quest 2.
